entries: When the raider is wielding a shield and is hit by an attack made by a creature they can see, the raider gains a +4 bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If this causes the attack to miss, the raider's shield breaks, and until they get a new shield, their AC is reduced by 2 and they can't use this reaction or make a Shield Shove attack.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of combat, the scoundrel has advantage on attack rolls against any surprised creature.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the scoundrel makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Hit 'Em Where It Hurts
entries: When the scoundrel has advantage on a weapon attack roll, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage on a hit.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the scoundrel can make a dagger attack against the target with advantage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the wizard can cast the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the wizard makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Arcane Staff
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Gust of Wind (1/Day; 2nd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: A 10-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line of strong wind gusts from the wizard for 1 minute. Each creature who starts their turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the wizard. Each creature in that area must spend 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot they move toward the wizard.

The gust disperses gas or vapor, and it extinguishes candles, torches, and similar unprotected flames. It has a 50 percent chance to extinguish protected flames like lanterns. The wizard can use a bonus action to change the direction in which the wind blasts from them.

action.name: Lightning Bolt (3/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
entries: The wizard fires magical lightning in a 5-foot-wide, 100-foot-long line. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The lightning ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

reaction.name: Arcane Shield (3/Day)
entries: When the wizard is hit by an attack, they magically gain a +5 bonus to AC against that attack, potentially causing it to miss. If the attacker is within 10 feet of the wizard, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) thunder damage and be pushed 10 feet away from the wizard.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When the trickshot makes an attack, they have advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Point Blank Shooting
entries: When the trickshot hits a creature within 30 feet of them with a ranged weapon attack, they deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. Additionally, being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose disadvantage on the trickshot's ranged attack rolls.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bayonet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Ricochet Bolt {@recharge 5}
entries: The trickshot uses a special ricocheting bolt to make one Heavy Crossbow attack against a target within 100 feet of them, then a second Heavy Crossbow attack against a different target within 30 feet of the first target.

monster.name: Baron Uthrak

trait.name: Bloodstones (3 Uses)
entries: When Baron Uthrak fails a saving throw while holding his magic longsword Nine Lives, he can choose to succeed instead. If he does so, he takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage as one of the bloodstones set in the sword's pommel fills with his blood.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Baron Uthrak makes an attack, he has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Baron Uthrak makes two attacks using Nine Lives, Whip, or both.

action.name: Nine Lives
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward Baron Uthrak.

bonus.name: Kneel, Peasant!
entries: Baron Uthrak kicks a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Riposte
entries: When a creature Baron Uthrak can see misses him with a melee attack, Baron Uthrak makes a melee attack against that creature.

legendaryHeader: Baron Uthrak has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Shoot!
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Baron Uthrak who can hear him can make a ranged weapon attack (no action required).

legendary.name: Action 2: Form Up!
entries: Baron Uthrak and each ally within 60 feet of him who can hear him can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Baron Uthrak and each ally enters a defensive stance that lasts until that creature moves or is {@condition restrained} or {@condition incapacitated}. When two or more allies in a defensive stance are within 5 feet of each other, attack rolls against them are made with disadvantage.

legendary.name: Action 3: Lead from the Front
entries: Baron Uthrak moves up to twice his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this movement, he can make up to four Nine Lives or Whip attacks with advantage, each against a different target. After he attacks a target in this way, each ally within 5 feet of that target can make a melee attack with advantage against the same target (no action required).

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Halberd)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus damage. Beginning at 7th level, the mercenary can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Battlefield Medicine (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the mercenary restores PBd8 hit points to a creature they can see within 5 feet of them.

action.name: 5th Level: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: The mercenary takes the Attack action, making each attack with advantage and dealing an extra PBd4 slashing damage on a hit.

action.name: 7th Level: Halberd Master (3/Day)
entries: When a creature enters a space within the mercenary's reach, the mercenary uses a reaction to make a signature attack with advantage against that creature. If this attack hits, it deals an extra PBd6 slashing damage.

monster.name: Kingfissure Worm

trait.name: Multiple Tongues
entries: The worm has three tongues, each of which can be targeted with attacks (AC 20, immunity to psychic damage) while that tongue is grappling a creature. When a tongue takes 35 damage or more in a single turn, that tongue is destroyed, releasing any target it was grappling. The worm can't use a destroyed tongue with their Multiattack or Tongue Grab action until they finish a long rest. Damaging or destroying a tongue deals no damage to the worm.

trait.name: Slowed, Not Stopped (3/Day)
entries: When the worm fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead. When they do, their speed and the reach of their Tongue Grab attack are each reduced by a cumulative 10 feet until they finish a long rest. The worm's speed and reach can't be reduced below 5 feet in this way.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half their burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in their wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm can make a number of Tongue Grab attacks equal to the number of tongues they currently have (see Multiple Tongues). The worm can replace any number of those attacks with a use of Swallow.

action.name: Tongue Grab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage, and the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this grapple ends, the worm can't use this tongue against another target.

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, they must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed (as if by the worm's Swallow action).

action.name: Swallow
entries: The worm pulls a Huge or smaller {@condition grappled} creature into their maw and swallows them. A swallowed creature is no longer {@condition grappled}, but they are {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside them, the worm must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution check at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of whom fall {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Tongue Sweep
entries: The worm violently swings a creature they have {@condition grappled}. The {@condition grappled} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, and each enemy within 10 feet of the {@condition grappled} creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Tongue Recall
entries: When one of the worm's tongues takes damage that doesn't immediately destroy it, the worm can release any target that tongue is grappling and recall the tongue back inside the worm's body. That tongue can't be targeted until the worm uses it to grapple a creature again.

legendaryHeader: The worm has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. They can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Open the Earth
entries: The worm writhes, sending tremors through the ground and opening a 20-foot-wide, 100-foot-long, 40-foot-deep fissure in the ground, originating from the worm. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature falls into the fissure, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage from the fall and landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature flees to the closest unoccupied space outside the fissure's area.

legendary.name: Action 2: Earth Breach
entries: The worm burrows up to half their speed and then bursts through the surface, breaching the ground in a 10-foot-radius circle. Huge and smaller creatures within that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed (as if by the worm's Swallow action).

legendary.name: Action 3: Better Out Than In
entries: The worm projectile vomits the contents of their stomach in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures who were swallowed by the worm are regurgitated, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and landing {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space of the worm's choice within that area.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Tongue Lash)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB acid damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The worm makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack roll made against the target before the start of the worm's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Tongue Grab (5 Ferocity)
entries: The worm makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the worm can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Swallow (8 Ferocity)
entries: The worm attempts to swallow a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of them. he target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes PBd6 bludgeoning damage and is swallowed. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't swallowed. The worm can have only one target swallowed at a time.

A swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, they have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and they take PBd6 acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns. Whenever the worm takes damage, they must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or regurgitate the swallowed creature, who falls {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the worm. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 or half the triggering damage, whichever is higher. If the worm is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by the worm and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Item Storage
entries: The worm can swallow an object without harming it by storing the object in a second stomach. They can use this bonus action again to regurgitate a specific stored object without disturbing any other objects in their second stomach. A regurgitated object lands in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the worm.
The worm's second stomach can hold up to PB × 10 pounds of objects, not exceeding a volume of 10 cubic feet.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The adeptus gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the adeptus must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Firecracker
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition deafened} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of their next turn. The adeptus has advantage on this attack roll if the target is wearing metal armor.

action.name: Lesser Magic Missile (1/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: The adeptus creates three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of their choice who they can see within 120 feet of them. A dart deals 2 ({@damage 1d2 + 1}) force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and the adeptus can direct them to hit one creature or several. This action is considered to be the {@spell magic missile} spell for the purpose of other spells and effects.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The artifex gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the artifex must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The artifex makes one Chain Hook attack and uses Activate Trap, if available.

action.name: Chain Hook
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the artifex.

action.name: Activate Trap (3/Day)
entries: The artifex activates one of the following hidden traps; the artifex can't use the same trap two rounds in a row:

action.name: Spiky Pit Trap
entries: The artifex chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them, opening a concealed 15-foot-square trapdoor on the ground centered on that point to reveal a 10-foot-deep pit trap lined with spikes. Creatures on the ground in the trapdoor's area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature falls into the pit and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from the spikes and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage from the fall. On a successful save, a creature moves to the nearest unoccupied space outside that area.

action.name: Swarm of Bees Trap
entries: The artifex chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them, causing a buried canister to erupt and release a 15-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder of swarming bees. When a creature enters the swarm's area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. At the start of each of the artifex's turns, the swarm moves 10 feet away from the artifex in a straight line. The swarm disperses after 1 minute or when the artifex dies.

action.name: Wall of Fire Trap
entries: The artifex chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them, igniting a concealed trench of oil and creating a 20-foot long, 15-foot high, and 1-foot-thick wall of fire. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature who enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends their turn there takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. The wall is opaque and lasts for 1 minute.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The centurion gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the centurion must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Pilum
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Firetail Pilum (2/Day)
entries: The centurion ignites a pilum then uses it to make a ranged Pilum attack against a target within 60 feet of them. Hit or miss, the target and each creature in a 5-foot-wide line between the target and the centurion must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage. The line smolders for 1 minute, creating a 5-footwide, 20-foot-tall wall of opaque smoke. A creature within reach of the pilum can use an action to extinguish it, causing the smoke to dissipate.

action.name: Boom Pilum!!! (1/Day)
entries: The centurion straps a vial of unstable ores to a pilum then uses it to make a ranged Pilum attack against a target within 60 feet of them. Hit or miss, the ores explode after the attack. The target and each creature within 10 feet of them must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes only half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The legionary gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the legionary must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The legionary makes two Gladius attacks. They can replace one attack with a Shield Bash attack.

action.name: Gladius
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Reinforce
entries: When an ally within 10 feet of the legionary is targeted by an attack, the legionary can move to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of that creature. If that creature also has the Shield? Shield! trait, they gain the benefit of that trait against the triggering attack. To use this reaction, the legionary must be able to see the ally and the attacker.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The signifer gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the signifer must be wielding a shield.

trait.name: Standard Bearer
entries: Each kobold unit can have one or more signifers, whose weapon is their unit's battle standard. If a signifer drops their signum, they use the kobold tiro stat block instead. If an allied kobold tiro uses an action to pick up a signum not carried by another creature, that tiro uses the kobold signifer stat block instead. When a signifer or tiro's stat block changes in this way, any conditions or effects currently affecting them remain active, and their hit points and hit point maximum remain the same.
A signum that isn't being held by a creature can be damaged; it has AC 15, 5 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The signifer makes two Signum attacks.

action.name: Signum
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shield Wall Formation
entries: The signifer chooses up to four kobolds within 60 feet of them who can hear them. Each kobold can use their reaction to move up to their speed, and each kobold who does so must end this movement within 5 feet of an ally.

bonus.name: Glory to the Legion (1/Day)
entries: The signifer and each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them regains 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the tiro takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the tiro takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The tiro gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the tiro must be wielding a shield.

trait.name: Testudo
entries: When the tiro finishes a long rest, they choose a non-minion creature to be their commander. While a tiro who isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone} is within 5 feet of their commander, the commander gains a cumulative +1 bonus to AC (maximum bonus of +5).

action.name: Pugio (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Shield?
entries: Shield! The veles gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the veles must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Pilum
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage. If the attack hits a creature wielding a shield, the veles can embed the pilum in the shield, giving the target disadvantage on attack rolls until the target either stops wielding the shield or uses an action to remove the pilum from it. The veles carries six pila.

bonus.name: Pivot
entries: The veles moves up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Not What I Seem
entries: The venator begins combat disguised as an inexperienced warrior. They have advantage on their first weapon attack roll against a creature who hasn't seen them make an attack.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The venator gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the venator must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Dolabra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until they are freed. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming them and destroys the net. The venator carries one net.

bonus.name: Lost in the Crowd
entries: The venator takes the Hide action. They have advantage on their Dexterity (Stealth) check if they are within 5 feet of two or more allied kobolds.

bonus.name: Then We Light the Net on Fire!
entries: The venator chooses a creature within 5 feet of them who is {@condition restrained} by a net and lights that net on fire. While {@condition restrained} by the net, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns. Each time the net deals damage, roll any die. On an odd result, the net burns away and is destroyed, freeing the {@condition restrained} creature. A creature who attempts to free the {@condition restrained} creature from the net (as described in the venator's Net attack) automatically puts out the fire as part of that action, regardless of whether that check succeeds.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The drangolin can burrow through solid rock at half their burrow speed and leaves behind a 3-foot-diameter tunnel when they burrow. Tiny and Small creatures can move through it normally, and Medium and Large creatures can squeeze through it. This tunnel collapses after 10 minutes.

action.name: Fiery Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Erupt (1/Day)
entries: If the drangolin is burrowing within 10 feet of the surface, they can erupt from the ground (without spending movement) into a space that contains one or more creatures. When they do, each creature within 10 feet of the drangolin must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. A creature directly above the drangolin when they emerge has disadvantage on this saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes only half as much damage and is pushed 5 feet to an unoccupied space of their choice instead of being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Wrecking Ball (1/Day)
entries: The drangolin moves up to twice their walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While doing so, they can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. If the drangolin enters another creature's space during this move, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the drangolin enters the space of a structure or object that isn't being worn or carried, it takes twice as much damage.

reaction.name: Ash Shot
entries: When a creature the drangolin can sense moves within 5 feet of them, the drangolin sprays them with a cloud of ash. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Gladius)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus damage. Beginning at 7th level, the decanus can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Reinforce (3/Day)
entries: When the decanus sees an ally within 30 feet of them being targeted by an attack, the decanus can use a reaction to move up to their speed toward the target. If the decanus ends their movement within 5 feet of the target, the target gains a +PB bonus to their AC until the beginning of the decanus's next turn, including against the triggering attack.

action.name: 5th Level: Shield Bash (3/Day)
entries: The decanus attempts to topple a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Succeed or fail, the decanus then makes two signature attacks against any creature within reach.

action.name: 7th Level: One-Kobold Army (1/Day)
entries: The decanus moves up to their speed, then makes a number of signature attacks equal to the number of enemies within 5 feet of them (minimum of three attacks). Each enemy within range must be attacked at least once. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the decanus for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The drangolin can burrow through solid rock at half their burrow speed and leaves behind a 3-foot-diameter tunnel when they burrow. Tiny and Small creatures can move through this tunnel normally, and Medium and Large creatures can squeeze through it. This tunnel collapses after 10 minutes.

action.name: Signature Attack (Claws)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Spit Breath (2 Ferocity)
entries: The drangolin breathes fire at their foe. This attack uses the statistics for their signature attack, except the fire is a ranged weapon with a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 60 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB damage, and all the damage dealt by the attack is fire damage instead of piercing damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Roll Out (5 Ferocity)
entries: The drangolin moves up to their walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. The drangolin can end this movement in a space that contains another creature. If they do, that creature takes 2 × PB bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet the drangolin traveled, and they must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the drangolin's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: 5th Level: Rend and Roast (8 Ferocity)
entries: The drangolin makes two signature attacks against the same target, then breathes fire on them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking PBd6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Ash Shot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When an enemy the drangolin can see moves within 5 feet of the drangolin's caregiver, the drangolin sprays the enemy with ash. If the drangolin is within 30 feet of their caregiver, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the drangolin's next turn.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the lightbender is subjected to an effect that allows them to make a saving throw to take only half damage, they instead take no damage if they succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if they fail.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lightbender moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits them with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the lightbender can make one Bite attack against them as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lightbender makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, or uses their Tail Whip twice.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Hypnotic Mane (1/Day)
entries: The lightbender discharges the light absorbed in their mane into a brilliant, mesmerizing display. Each creature within 15 feet of the lightbender must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the lightbender for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0. If a creature {@condition charmed} in this way takes damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, the condition ends for that creature.

reaction.name: Afterimage
entries: When the lightbender is hit by an attack, they can reveal that the attacker is attacking a past visual imprint of the lightbender. The lightbender appears in an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet of their imprint, the attack misses, then the imprint disappears. The lightbender can't use this reaction if the attacker relies on senses other than sight, such as blindsight, or if they can perceive illusions as false, as with truesight.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tail Whip (2 Ferocity)
entries: The lightbender makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PB radiant damage to the target, and a different creature the lightbender chooses within 15 feet of them takes PB radiant damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Silent Pounce (5 Ferocity)
entries: The lightbender teleports 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. Before or after teleporting, the lightbender can make a signature attack. If the attack hits, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Hypnotic Mane (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the lightbender must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the lightbender until the end of the lightbender's next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0. If a creature {@condition charmed} in this way takes damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, the condition ends on that creature.

reaction.name: Shared Afterimage (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the lightbender and their caregiver are within 30 feet of each other and one of them is hit by an attack, the lightbender reveals that both they and their caregiver are past visual imprints. The lightbender and the caregiver each appear in an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet of their imprints, the attack misses, then the imprints disappear. The lightbender can't use this reaction if the attacker relies on senses other than sight, such as blindsight, or if they can perceive illusions as false, as with truesight.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bloodeye can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bloodeye makes one Bite or one Bola attack and uses Bloodeye Bolt or Mesmeric Lure, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bola
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition restrained} by the bola. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach from the bola on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the bola (AC 10) destroys it and frees a creature {@condition restrained} by it without harming them.

action.name: Bloodeye Bolt (3/Day)
entries: The bloodeye shoots blood from their eyes at one creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Mesmeric Lure (3/Day)
entries: The bloodeye hypnotically stares at one creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or all creatures other than the bloodeye are {@condition invisible} to them until the end of the bloodeye's next turn.

reaction.name: Reptilian Escape (1/Day)
entries: If the bloodeye fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The grunt can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the grunt takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the grunt takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} by each grunt who joined the attack (escape {@dc 10} plus the number of grunts grappling; on a success, the target escapes every grunt grappling them). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the grunts who joined the attack can't bite another target.

action.name: Javelin (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The scaletooth can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scaletooth makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the scaletooth can move them 5 feet in any direction or grapple them (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the scaletooth can't make a Tail attack against another target.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: The scaletooth makes a Bite attack with advantage against one creature they have {@condition grappled}, dealing an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage on a hit.

reaction.name: Reptilian Escape (1/Day)
entries: If the scaletooth fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

trait.name: Aerial Agility
entries: While the terrorsaur is flying, their AC is 16.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The terrorsaur can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Running Start
entries: The terrorsaur can use only their flying speed if they first either fall 10 feet without hitting the ground or walk 10 feet in a straight line on that turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The terrorsaur makes one Bite attack and one Glaive attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blowgun {@recharge}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Reptilian Escape (1/Day)
entries: If the terrorsaur fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

reaction.name: Skulking Retreat
entries: If the terrorsaur takes damage from a melee attack, they can move up to half their speed.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Greatsword)
entries: {@atk m} +3 plus damage. Beginning at 7th level, the hunter can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Wrenching Bite (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the hunter makes a signature attack against a Large or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until the grapple ends, the target takes PB piercing damage at the end of each of their turns, and the hunter can't use their Wrenching Bite against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Thrashing Tail (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the hunter makes a signature attack against a Large or smaller creature. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. While the hunter is within 5 feet of this {@condition prone} target, the target can't stand up unless they use an action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength (Athletics) check. On a success, the target can stand up.

action.name: 7th Level: Hypnotic Sleep (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the hunter drones lullingly. Each creature within 5 feet of the hunter who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. An {@condition unconscious} target wakes up if they take damage, the hunter becomes {@condition incapacitated}, the hunter moves more than 5 feet away from the target, or another creature uses an action to rouse the target.

monster.name: Manticore
languages: understands any one language but speaks only through the use of their Mimicry trait

trait.name: Agile Predator
entries: When the manticore hits a creature with an attack on the manticore's turn, the manticore doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of that turn.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The manticore can mimic any words or phrases they have heard in a language they understand. A creature who hears the speech can tell it is an imitation with a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes one Bite and one Claw attack, or two Tail Spike attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature who is {@condition frightened} of the manticore, they take an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage, and the manticore can move the target up to 5 feet horizontally.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Trumpeting Howl (1/Day)
entries: Each enemy within 120 feet who can hear the manticore must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the manticore for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If the initial saving throw fails by 5 or more, a creature is also dazed while {@condition frightened} in this way

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Learning to Fly
entries: The manticore has a flying speed of 10 × PB feet.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The manticore can mimic any words or phrases they have heard in a language the manticore's caregiver understands. A creature who hears the speech can tell it is an imitation with a successful {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tail Spike (2 Ferocity)
entries: The manticore hurls a spine from its tail. This attack uses the statistics for their signature attack, except the spine is a ranged weapon with a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 60 feet, and on a hit, the attack deals an extra PB of poison damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Trumpeting Howl (5 Ferocity)
entries: Each enemy within 30 feet of the manticore who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of them until the end of the manticore's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Poisoned Sting (8 Ferocity)
entries: . The manticore stings a target within 10 feet of them with their tail. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes PBd10 poison damage and becomes {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't dazed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The medusa uses Stone Gaze and makes two attacks using Snake Bite, Heavy Crossbow, or both.

action.name: Snake Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of the medusa's next turn.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Stone Gaze
entries: The medusa fires energy beams from their eyes at up to three creatures they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or begin turning to stone (save ends at end of turn). While turning to stone, a creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet and they have disadvantage on Dexterity checks and saving throws.
If a creature who is turning to stone is targeted by this action again and fails their save, their speed is reduced by another 10 feet and they are dazed until the effect ends.

If a creature who is turning to stone and dazed in this way is targeted by this action again and fails their save, they are {@condition petrified} and can no longer make saving throws to end the effects of Stone Gaze. The petrification lasts until the creature is restored by a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The medusa takes the Disengage or Hide action.

monster.name: Lady Emer

trait.name: Stone Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: When Emer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead by ending the effects of her Stone Gaze on a creature of her choice within 300 feet of her.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Emer uses Pinning Shot or makes three attacks using Snake Bite, Longbow, or both. She also uses Stone Gaze or Envenomed Stone, if available.

action.name: Snake Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of Emer's next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't take reactions.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Pinning Shot
entries: Emer makes three Longbow attacks against a creature touching the ground within 150 feet of her. If at least two of those attacks hit, the target is {@condition restrained} by arrows pinning their limbs to the ground. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way or another creature who can reach them can use an action to pull out the arrows and end the condition.

action.name: Stone Gaze
entries: Emer fires beams of energy from her eyes at up to three creatures she can see within 60 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or begin turning to stone (save ends at end of turn). While turning to stone, a creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet and they have disadvantage on Dexterity checks and saving throws. If a creature who is turning to stone is targeted by this action again and fails their save, their speed is reduced by another 10 feet and they are dazed until the effect ends.

If a creature who is turning to stone and dazed in this way is targeted by this action again and fails their save, they are {@condition petrified} and can no longer make saving throws to end the effects of Stone Gaze. The petrification lasts until the creature is restored by Emer's Stone Sacrifice trait, a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

action.name: Envenomed Stone {@recharge 5}
entries: Emer utters an ancient hex. Each creature within 60 feet of her who is being turned to stone by her Stone Gaze must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Mesmerizing Eyes
entries: The glowing eyes of Emer's snakes gaze at one creature Emer can see within 60 feet of her. If the target can see Emer, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the target's next turn. A target {@condition charmed} in this way must immediately use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed in a direction of Emer's choice.

reaction.name: Blinding Mucus
entries: When a creature Emer can see within 5 feet of her hits her with a melee attack, Emer spits venom at their eyes. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Emer has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: I See You!
entries: Emer uses Stone Gaze against each enemy she can see within 60 feet of her.

legendary.name: Action 2: Medusa's Evolution
entries: Emer grows wings from her back, gaining a flying speed of 40 feet, then she moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks. After 1 minute, the wings crumble to dust and her flying speed is lost.

legendary.name: Action 3: Stone Puppets
entries: Emer mentally manipulates the stone in each creature who is being turned to stone by her Stone Gaze. Emer and each of those creatures move up to their speed then make a weapon attack against a creature of Emer's choice (no action required).

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Snake Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d10} plus PB piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the headstrong can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Snake Spit (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the headstrong spits venom at the eyes of a creature within 5 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Venomous Bite (3/Day)
entries: When the headstrong hits a creature with a signature attack, the headstrong injects the target with venom. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes PBd6 poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the start of the headstrong's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: 7th Level: Stone Gaze (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the headstrong fires energy beams from their eyes at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or begin to turn to stone and be {@condition restrained}.

A target {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 1 hour or until they are restored by a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The mimic can imitate any sounds they have heard, including voices. A creature who hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom (Insight) check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Gnashing Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. If the target is {@condition grappled} by the mimic, they take an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic polymorphs into a Small, Medium, or Large object or back into their true amorphous form. Other than size, the mimic's statistics are the same in each form. Anything they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.

action.name: Envelop
entries: While grappling a creature, the mimic uses their Shapechanger action to polymorph into an object that is the same size or bigger than the {@condition grappled} creature (if the mimic isn't already in such a form). The creature is then enveloped by the mimic. An enveloped creature is no longer {@condition grappled}, but they can't breathe, are {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mimic, and take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the mimic's turns. When the mimic moves, the enveloped creature moves with them. The mimic can envelop one creature at a time.

An enveloped creature can use their action to try to escape by making a {@dc 13} Strength check. On a successful check, the creature is no longer enveloped and is shunted to an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the mimic. The creature automatically escapes if the mimic uses Shapechanger or Panic Shift, becomes {@condition incapacitated}, or dies.

reaction.name: Panic Shift (1/Day)
entries: When the mimic takes damage, they release any {@condition grappled} or enveloped creatures and then polymorph into a Small dense object with spikes, such as an iron ball or helm. While in this form, the mimic's walking and climbing speeds are doubled, they have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, they can only take the Dash, Disengage, or Shapechanger action, and a creature who touches the mimic or hits them with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage. This effect ends when the mimic dies or uses their Shapechanger action to polymorph into another form.

trait.name: In Your Space
entries: The mimiature can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the mimiature can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the mimiature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the mimiature takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Sticky Swarm (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage. Until the end of the target's next turn, they have disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple, and they have advantage on ability checks made to initiate or maintain a grapple. Additionally, if three or more mimiatures joined the attack, the target's appendages become so sticky that until the end of the target's next turn, they can't cast spells with somatic components, they can't drop objects, and they can't interact with objects other the ones they are already holding.

action.name: Group Shapechanger
entries: The mimiature polymorphs into a Tiny object or back into their true amorphous form. If four mimiatures within 5 feet of each other use this action together, they can join together to become one Small object. Anything a mimiature is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. A mimiature in object form reverts to their true form if any mimiature in the group moves, takes an action, or dies.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use their action to polymorph into a Small, Medium, or Large object or back into their true amorphous form. Other than size, the mimic's statistics are the same in each form. Anything they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack made against the target before the start of the mimic's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Adhesive Pseudopods (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic attempts to adhere to each creature of their choice within 5 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}).

action.name: 5th Level: I'm You (8 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic uses their Shapechanger trait to polymorph into one Large or smaller creature they can see within 5 feet of them. Other than size, the mimic's statistics do not change, and the mimic reverts to their previous form at the start of their next turn.

After transforming, the mimic can make a signature attack against the target whose form they have taken. Hit or miss, the target must then make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, attacks against the target have advantage and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the mimic's next turn.

bonus.name: Wearable Companion
entries: While the mimic is within 5 feet of their caregiver, the mimic can pull themself into the caregiver's space, cover the caregiver's body, and take on the appearance of clothing. While the caregiver is wearing the mimic, the mimic's space is not difficult terrain for the caregiver, the caregiver has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks, and the caregiver can change the appearance of their mimic clothing at will (no action required) as long as the caregiver and mimic aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

Any attack that hits the caregiver also hits the mimic they are wearing, and vice versa, with both taking the full damage and effect of the attack. While worn in this way, the mimic can't move, and they can't take actions other than using a bonus action to revert to their previous form. A mimic automatically reverts to their previous form if they enter a rampage. Upon reverting to their previous form, the mimic is no longer worn by their caregiver, and the mimic enters the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

trait.name: Dizzying Gore
entries: If the minotaur moves at least 20 feet straight toward a Large or smaller creature and then hits the creature with a Goring Horns attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the minotaur's next turn.

trait.name: Minotaur Senses
entries: The minotaur always knows which way is north and can't become lost.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The minotaur makes one Maul attack and one Goring Horns attack.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, the minotaur can push the target 5 feet away.

action.name: Goring Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliatory Gore
entries: When a creature the minotaur can see within 40 feet of them deals damage to the minotaur, the minotaur can move up to their speed. If the minotaur ends this movement within 5 feet of that creature, the minotaur can make a Goring Horns attack against them.

trait.name: Goring Run
entries: If the lackey moves at least 20 feet straight toward an enemy and then ends their movement within 5 feet of the enemy, the enemy takes 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the lackey takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the lackey takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Goring Horns (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 piercing damage. If this attack was made by more than one lackey, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be moved 5 feet horizontally for each minion who joined the attack. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of lackeys who joined the attack.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Goring Horns)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d10} plus PB piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the devastator can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Furious Charge (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the devastator moves up to their speed. At the end of this movement, they can make a signature attack. If that attack hits a Large or smaller creature, the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the devastator, and the devastator and their allies have advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the devastator's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Fearsome Gore (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the devastator makes a signature attack against a creature within 5 feet of them. On a hit, the attack deals an extra PBd10 piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the devastator until the end of the devastator's next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Retaliatory Charge (1/Day)
entries: When a creature the devastator can see within 40 feet of them deals damage to the devastator, the devastator can use a reaction to move up to their speed toward the creature. If the devastator ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, they can make two signature attacks against the creature with a +PB bonus to those attack and damage rolls.

trait.name: Defiant Anger
entries: When the ogre has half their hit points or fewer, they are resistant to mundane bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ogre makes one Spiked Club attack and one Fist attack.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ogre can't use this fist to attack other targets. The ogre has two fists, one of which holds their club.

action.name: People-Bowling
entries: The ogre throws one Medium or smaller creature they are grappling up to 30 feet horizontally. Each creature in the thrown creature's path must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. After this throw, the thrown creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Bellow (1/Day)
entries: The ogre yells in the face of one creature within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the ogre until the end of the ogre's next turn. A creature who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to all ogres' Bellow for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Violent Focus (1/Day)
entries: If the ogre takes damage while {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition poisoned}, they end these conditions on themself.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the goon takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the goon takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Fist (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage, and if this attack was made by more than one goon, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and moved up to 10 feet horizontally. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of goons who joined the attack.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Signature Attack (Spiked Club)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 2d4} plus PB piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the basher can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Angry Denial (3/Day)
entries: When the basher takes damage from a creature the basher can see within 5 feet of them, the basher can use their reaction to instead take no damage and make a signature attack against the creature.

action.name: 5th Level: Throw Away (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the basher grabs a willing Medium or smaller creature they can see within 5 feet of them and hurls the creature to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the basher. If the creature lands within 5 feet of an enemy, the creature can use a reaction to make a melee attack against that enemy.

action.name: 7th Level: Wide Sweep (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the basher sweeps their spiked club in an enormous circle, making a signature attack against each enemy within 10 feet of them. This attack has a +PB bonus to its attack and damage rolls, and if it hits a Large or smaller creature, the basher can push the target up to 10 feet away from them.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The olothec can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The olothec is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The olothec has advantage on saving throws against supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The olothec makes six Devolving Tentacle attacks and uses Piscine Transformation.

action.name: Devolving Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. The first time a creature is hit with this attack on a turn, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be injected with a degenerative psionic slime (save ends at end of turn). While slimed, each time the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, they must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the {@dice d20} roll. At the end of a slimed creature's turn, the size of the subtracted die increases by one: the {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, the {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on, to a maximum of {@dice d12}. The cure ailment power or {@spell lesser restoration} spell also ends this effect.

action.name: Piscine Transformation (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The olothec targets a Humanoid they can see within 60 feet of them with a pulse of transformational energy. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or undergo one of the following transformations of the olothec's choice:

items: {@b Head.} The target's head transforms into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for their body. They can't speak.
{@b Legs.} The target's legs become fins. Their walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless their walking speed is slower), and they gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

{@b Torso.} The target's torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. They can only breathe water and can hold their breath for 1 hour. If the target isn't underwater when this transformation takes effect, they begin suffocating.

entries: This transformation lasts until the target is affected by a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher or a {@spell greater restoration} spell. A target who suffers all three transformations at once is permanently transformed into a hybrid fishlike creature and can only be returned to their original form by a {@spell wish} spell or similar magic.

bonus.name: Jaunt (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The olothec teleports 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

monster.name: Ithu'rath

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Ithu'rath can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: Ithu'rath is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Slimy Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When Ithu'rath fails a saving throw, they can succeed on the save by channeling the power of their protective slime. Until the end of Ithu'rath's next turn, creatures have advantage on the saving throw for Ithu'rath's Devolving Tentacle attack.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Ithu'rath has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ithu'rath makes six Devolving Tentacle attacks and uses Piscine Transformation.

action.name: Devolving Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage. The first time a creature is hit with this attack on a turn, they must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be injected with a degenerative psionic slime (save ends at end of turn). While slimed, each time the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, they must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the {@dice d20} roll. At the end of a slimed creature's turn, the size of the subtracted die increases by one: the {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, the {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on, to a maximum of {@dice d12}. The cure ailment power or {@spell lesser restoration} spell also ends this effect.

action.name: Piscine Transformation (3rd-Order Power)
entries: Ithu'rath targets a creature with a head, legs, or torso they can see within 60 feet of them, blasting them with a pulse of transformational energy. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or undergo one of the following transformations of the Ithu'rath's choice:

items: {@b Head.} The target's head transforms into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for their body. They can't speak.
{@b Legs.} The target's legs become fins. Their walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless their walking speed is slower), and they gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

{@b Torso.} The target's torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. They can only breathe water and can hold their breath for 1 hour. If the target isn't underwater when this transformation takes effect, they begin suffocating.

entries: The transformation lasts until a cure ailment power of 4th order or higher or the {@spell greater restoration} spell affects the target. A target who suffers all three transformations at once is permanently transformed into a hybrid fishlike creature and can only be returned to their original form by a {@spell wish} spell or similar supernatural effects.

bonus.name: Jaunt (3rd-Order Power)
entries: Ithu'rath teleports 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

reaction.name: Liquefy (3rd-Order Power)
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of Ithu'rath hits them with an attack, Ithu'rath can psionically barrage that creature. That creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from Ithu'rath and be {@condition restrained} until the end of the creature's next turn, as their lower body temporarily melts into an immovable goo.

legendaryHeader: Ithu'rath has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. They can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Skeletal Collapse
entries: Ithu'rath targets one or more creatures with a skeleton within 60 feet of them, attempting to temporarily melt their ligaments. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and have disadvantage on Strength- and Dexterity-based ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Psychic Pulse
entries: Ithu'rath channels a pulse of telekinetic energy to scour and harry their foes. Each enemy within 60 feet of Ithu'rath must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) force damage and be moved up to 30 feet in any direction.

legendary.name: Action 3: Slime Storm
entries: Ithu'rath unleashes a cloud of transformative slime. Each creature within 60 feet of Ithu'rath who isn't an olothec or a slime servant must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 45 ({@damage 10d8}) piercing damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn as their eyes temporarily turn into insectoid feelers. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Gnashing Horde
entries: If an enemy the blitzer can see starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more blitzers, the enemy takes 1 piercing damage for each blitzer within 5 feet of them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the blitzer takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the blitzer takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Relentless Minion
entries: When the blitzer is reduced to 0 hit points while they aren't {@condition incapacitated}, they can deal 1 piercing damage to an enemy within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Spear (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the bloodrunner isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the bloodrunner drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

trait.name: Unimpeded
entries: The bloodrunner can occupy a {@condition prone} creature's space. The first time the bloodrunner enters a {@condition prone} creature's space on the bloodrunner's turn, the {@condition prone} creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage. When a {@condition prone} creature in the bloodrunner's space stands up, the creature enters the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the bloodrunner moves at least 10 feet before hitting a Large or smaller creature with this attack, the bloodrunner can choose to knock the target {@condition prone} or push them up to 10 feet away.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: When the bloodrunner makes a Dexterity saving throw, they can gain advantage on the save. To do so, the bloodrunner can't be {@condition prone}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained}.

monster.name: Orc Conduit
resist: determined by the conduit's affinity trait

trait.name: Affinity
entries: The conduit has a lifelong affinity for one of the following damage types: cold, fire, or lightning. The chosen type determines the conduit's damage resistance and the damage of their Elemental Discharge and Power Burst actions.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the conduit isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the conduit drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Elemental Discharge (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) damage of the type determined by the conduit's Affinity trait.

action.name: Power Burst (2/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: The conduit unleashes explosive energy in a 15-foot cone. The ground in that area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw.
