On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of the type determined by the conduit's Affinity trait, and they are pushed 10 feet away from the conduit. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

bonus.name: Rush
entries: The conduit takes the Dash action.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the forcecaller takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the forcecaller takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Relentless Minion
entries: When the forcecaller is reduced to 0 hit points while they aren't {@condition incapacitated}, they can deal 1 force damage to an enemy within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Chainspoken (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 force damage. If two or more forcecallers joined the attack, they can deal the same amount of force damage to another creature within 10 feet of the target.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the fury isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the fury drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Haymaker Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) slashing damage if the target is {@condition prone}. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Healing Rally (1/Day)
entries: The fury regains 5 hit points.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the garroter isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the garroter drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Strangle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the target can't speak intelligibly or cast spells with verbal components. If the attack was made with advantage, the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute (save ends at start of turn) or until they take damage. A creature can use an action to shake another creature awake who falls {@condition unconscious} in this way.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the attack was made with advantage, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cloak (1/Day)
entries: The garroter magically turns {@condition invisible} for 1 minute. Any equipment the garroter wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with them. While {@condition invisible}, the garroter's movements make no sound. If the garroter hits a creature with an attack, casts a spell, or takes damage, the effect ends.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the godcaller isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the godcaller drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Power Chord (1st-Level Spell)
entries: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack:
{@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature who can hear the godcaller. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) thunder damage.

action.name: Cadenza
entries: The godcaller chooses another creature within 30 feet of them. If the target can hear the godcaller, the target can use their reaction to move up to their speed and make an attack.

action.name: Song of the Gods (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: The godcaller and each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them has advantage on attack rolls until the start of the godcaller's next turn. This effect ends early if the godcaller takes any damage.

bonus.name: Rallying Ostinato (1/Day)
entries: The godcaller and up to three allies within 60 feet of them who can hear them regain 20 hit points, and these creatures ignore difficult terrain for 1 minute.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the rampart isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the rampart drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rampart makes two Spear attacks. If the rampart targets the same creature with both attacks, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the rampart until the start of the rampart's next turn.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: No!
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of the rampart targets another creature with an attack, the attacker must target the rampart instead.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the terranova isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the terranova drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

trait.name: Tremorspeak
entries: The terranova can sense anything a willing creature within 30 feet of them can sense with tremorsense or Tremorspeak.

trait.name: Unhindered
entries: The terranova ignores difficult terrain.

action.name: Earth Pillar (1st-Level Spell)
entries: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack:
{@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target touching the ground. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Quake
entries: The terranova chooses up to five creatures on the ground within 15 feet of them and stomps the ground. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sinkhole
entries: The terranova chooses up to two creatures on the ground within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A creature can use their action to free themself or another creature within their reach, ending the effect on that creature.

bonus.name: Rush
entries: The terranova takes the Dash action.

bonus.name: Unearth Mohlers (1/Day)
entries: The terranova stomps, and {@dice 1d3 + 1} {@creature mohler|FleeMortals}s pop out of the ground in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of them. The mohlers are friendly to the terranova and act immediately after the terranova's turn on the same initiative count.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Earth Bump
entries: As the mohler burrows under a Large or smaller creature on the ground within 5 feet of them, the mohler shifts the ground. The creature above them must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ground Grinder
entries: The mohler burrows up to their burrowing speed. Ground within 5 feet of where the mohler burrows becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Zip
entries: If the mohler fails a Dexterity saving throw while burrowing, they succeed instead.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The scyza deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: War Harness
entries: While wearing a war harness, the scyza can carry up to thirty-six Medium or smaller creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scyza makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is on top of the scyza, the target falls off and lands {@condition prone}.

action.name: Head Crest
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature who can hear, they are dazed until the end of their next turn by the crest's deep ringing.

action.name: Claw Twister {@recharge}
entries: The scyza claws at the ground in a flurry. Each creature of the scyza's choice within 5 feet of them must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) slashing damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is {@condition blinded} by a cloud of dust until the start of the scyza's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition blinded}.

monster.name: Dohma Raskovar

trait.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: If Raskovar fails a saving throw, he can expend a use of his Dohma Rally without gaining its benefits (no action required) and succeed instead.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When Raskovar isn't {@condition incapacitated} and he is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Raskovar drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Raskovar makes three Repeating Crossbow attacks or two War Mace attacks.

action.name: War Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is dazed until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d12 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Reinforcements (1/Day)
entries: Raskovar takes the Dodge action, and ten orc blitzers appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of him.

bonus.name: Dohma Rally (3/Day)
entries: Raskovar regains 20 hit points, and he gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of his next turn.

reaction.name: On the House
entries: When a creature Raskovar can see within 30 feet of him fails an ability check or misses with an attack roll, that creature can reroll the check or attack, choosing either result.

legendaryHeader: Raskovar has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Close In
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Raskovar who can hear him can move up to their speed. After this movement, each enemy within 5 feet of at least one creature who moved must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Raskovar for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Lockdown
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Raskovar who can hear him can make a Strength (Athletics) check with advantage to grapple an enemy within their reach (no action required). Then Raskovar can move up to his speed.

legendary.name: Action 3: Do It Myself
entries: Raskovar moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. At the end of the movement, he can make up to five War Mace attacks with advantage.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Warhammer)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack:

+3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d10} plus PB bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the blacksmith can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Relentless Rush (3/Day)
entries: When the blacksmith isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they take damage but aren't killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits, the blacksmith regains twice their PB hit points.

action.name: 5th Level: Reinforce Armor (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a piece of armor and fortifies it. For the next 10 minutes, a creature wearing the armor gains a bonus to their AC equal to half the blacksmith's PB.

action.name: 7th Level: Fortify Weapon (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a weapon and polishes it. For 1 minute, the weapon is magical and deals an extra PB damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Earth Bump (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mohler burrows up to their speed and chooses one Large or smaller creature they come within 5 feet of during the move. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 3rd Level: Sinkhole (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mohler burrows up to their speed and targets a creature they can sense on the surface within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the ground until the start of the mohler's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Terranova (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature on the ground within 10 feet of the mohler must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@dice 1d6} plus PB bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature who fails this saving throw by 5 or more is {@condition restrained} by the ground (save ends at end of turn). A creature can use their action to free themself or another creature within their reach, ending the effect.

reaction.name: Quick Pit (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If the mohler's caregiver fails a Dexterity saving throw while they are within 10 feet of the mohler and the mohler isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}, the mohler pulls the caregiver out of danger. The caregiver succeeds on the saving throw instead.

trait.name: Adjustable Appendages
entries: The otyugh has seven adjustable appendages, which they can convert into other appendages using their Transform bonus action. In their natural state, the otyugh has one eyestalk, three legs, and three tentacles. These appendages grant the following benefits:

items: {@b Eyestalks.} The otyugh's first eyestalk gives them darkvision out to a range of 60 feet and immunity to the flanked condition, and each additional eyestalk increases their darkvision's range by 60 feet. If the otyugh has no eyestalks, they are {@condition blinded} and lose immunity to the {@condition flanked}FleeMortals} condition.
{@b Legs.} Each leg gives the otyugh a cumulative walking speed of 15 feet.
{@b Tentacles.} The otyugh's number of tentacles determine how many attacks they can make with Multiattack and how many creatures they can grapple with Tentacle Slam.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of them that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

trait.name: Rot Leech
entries: At the start of each of the otyugh's turns, each creature {@condition grappled} by the otyugh has their hit point maximum reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) for 1 hour. The otyugh regains the same number of hit points. This effect can't reduce a creature's hit point maximum below their current hit points.

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The otyugh ignores difficult terrain. They also have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

trait.name: Vile Stench
entries: A creature who starts their turn within 10 feet of the otyugh must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The otyugh makes one Tentacle Slam attack for each tentacle they currently have (see Adjustable Appendages).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be diseased with otyuck. A creature with otyuck can't take the Dash action and their speed is halved.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh can grapple one target for each tentacle they currently have.

bonus.name: Transform
entries: The otyugh converts one of their Adjustable Appendages into an eyestalk, leg, or tentacle.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the dregsbelcher takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the dregsbelcher takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The dregsbelcher ignores difficult terrain. They also have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

trait.name: Whetted Appetites
entries: While within 60 feet of the dregsbelcher, each friendly non-minion otyugh gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls. This bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5) for each dregsbelcher in range of that creature.

action.name: Regurgitate (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage plus 2 acid damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The otyugh ignores difficult terrain. They have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@dice 1d6} plus PB piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tentacle Slam (2 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). The otyugh can only grapple one target at a time.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Retch (8 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh regurgitates garbage in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes PBd6 poison damage and is {@condition poisoned}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Slough Rot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The otyugh touches their caregiver and ends one disease or one of the following conditions affecting the caregiver: {@condition blinded}, dazed, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition poisoned}.

condition.name: Dazed
entries: A {@b dazed} creature can only do one of the following things on their turn: move, use an action, or use a bonus action. If a creature becomes dazed during their turn, their turn ends. The cure ailment power, {@spell lesser restoration} spell, and {@spell greater restoration} spell remove the dazed condition. At the GM’s discretion, other powers, spells, or effects might also remove the dazed condition.

When a dazed creature is affected by a spell or effect that gives them an extra action on their turn (like the {@spell haste} spell or the fighter’s Action Surge feature), they can still take this extra action, in addition to the movement, action, or bonus action allowed by the dazed condition.

Some creatures in this book have immunity to the dazed condition. At the GM’s discretion, a creature published in the core rules or another supplement who has immunity to the paralyzed or stunned condition also has immunity to the dazed condition.

condition.name: Flanked
entries: If your game uses the optional flanking rules in the core rules, a creature who is immune to the {@b flanked} condition can’t be flanked regardless of the position of their enemies.

sense.name: Soulsight
entries: Demons have a special sense called soulsight, allowing them to perceive each creature, other than Constructs and Undead, within a certain radius. Soulsight doesn’t rely on sight but counts as “seeing” for features that require sight. Neither physical objects (including total cover) nor supernatural effects can impede soulsight unless otherwise stated. A demon’s stat block lists the radius of their soulsight under “Senses.”

optionalfeature.name: Control Projectiles
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Telekinesis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 reaction, which you take when a creature you can see within 60 feet of you makes a ranged weapon attack
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous
You telekinetically affect the projectile’s flight. The attack roll is made with advantage or disadvantage (your choice).

optionalfeature.name: Deserved Transfer
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You fire a bolt of draining psychic energy at a creature within range. Make a ranged power attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} psychic damage, and the psychic energy bounces to another creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The second creature gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d8}.

optionalfeature.name: Dream Spores
entries: {@i 5th-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You release a burst of psionic spores. Each creature you can see within 30 feet of you must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by you for the duration. While charmed in this way, a creature must use their movement during their turn to move within 10 feet of you by the safest available route.
A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw whenever they take damage, ending the effect on themself on a success.

optionalfeature.name: Energy Eyes
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Resopathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 120 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You beam elemental energy from your eyes at a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage 5d10} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Choose the damage type from the following list: cold, fire, lightning, or radiant.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d10}.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorated March
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 bonus action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You emit a burst of mentally invigorating energy into the mind of a creature you can see within range. That creature can use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, you target one additional creature.

optionalfeature.name: Liquefy
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 reaction
{@b Range:} 5 feet
{@b Duration:} 1 round

You psionically barrage your attacker with transformative energy. The attacker must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be pushed 5 feet away from you and restrained until the end of their next turn, as their lower body temporarily melts into an immovable goo.

optionalfeature.name: Memory Thief
entries: {@i 4th-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You plunder the mind of a creature you can see within 30 feet of you. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} psychic damage, their proficiency bonus is lowered by 1, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls and your power save DC for the duration.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d10}.

optionalfeature.name: Mental Lance
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You mentally assail a creature you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d10} psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of you for the duration (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn’t frightened.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d10}.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Scream
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You psionically pierce the mind of each enemy you can see within range. Each target must make an Intelligence saving throw, taking {@damage 5d6} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is automatically stabilized.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, the damage increases by {@damage 2d6}.

optionalfeature.name: Mind Splinter
entries: {@i 1st-Order Telepathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous

You attempt to erase your image from the mind of a creature within range. Make a ranged power attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage, and you become {@condition invisible} to them until the start of your next turn.
This power’s damage increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level ({@damage 2d6}), 11th level ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Phase
entries: {@i 4th-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} Self
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You imbue your body and everything you wear and carry with psychic energy, allowing it to pass through solid objects. For the duration, you can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. You take {@damage 1d10} force damage if you end your turn inside an object. If this power ends while you are inside a creature or object, you are shunted out of it into the closest unoccupied space of your choice.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 or more. For each increase of 1, you target one additional creature within 5 feet of you.

optionalfeature.name: Piscine Transformation
entries: {@i 3rd-Order Metamorphosis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 10 minutes

You target a Humanoid you can see within range with a pulse of transformational energy. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or undergo one of the following transformations of your choice for the duration. The target can choose to fail this saving throw.

items: {@b Head.} The target’s head transforms into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for their body. They can’t speak.
{@b Legs.} The target’s legs become fins. Their walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless their walking speed is slower), and they gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

{@b Torso.} The target’s torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. They can only breathe water and can hold their breath for 1 hour. If the target isn’t underwater when this transformation takes effect, they begin suffocating.

entries: {@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 2 to target any creature, instead of just a Humanoid, if they have the necessary body part you wish to transform.
Additionally, you can increase this power’s order by 2 to increase its duration to 1 hour.

optionalfeature.name: Shockwave
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Telekinesis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 bonus action
{@b Range:} Self
{@b Duration:} Instantaneous
You unleash a psionic shock wave. Each creature within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet directly away from you.

optionalfeature.name: Sickening Sympathy
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Telekinesis Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 reaction, which you take when another creature you can see within 30 feet of you is hit with an attack
{@b Range:} 30 feet
{@b Duration:} 1 round
The creature who made the triggering attack must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@damage poisoned} until the end of their next turn as they feel the nauseous pain of their target.

optionalfeature.name: Vanish for One
entries: {@i 2nd-Order Resopathy Power}
{@b Manifestation Time:} 1 action
{@b Range:} 60 feet
{@b Duration:} Concentration, up to 1 minute

You obscure yourself in the sight of a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or you become {@damage invisible} to them for the duration (save ends at end of turn). This effect ends early if you attack the creature, deal damage to them, or create an effect that forces them to make a saving throw.
{@b Increased Order.} When you manifest this power, you can increase its order by 1 to make its manifestation time 1 bonus action.
